text: Baluna, 'allaha nijera bandadera jan'ya yesaba sobhara bastu o bisud'dha jibika srsti karechena ta ke harama kareche [1]?’ Baluna, ‘parthiba jibane, bisesa kare keyamatera dine e saba tadera jan'ya, yara imana ane [2].’ Ebhabe amara jnani sampradayera jan'ya ayatasamuha bisadabhabe bibrta kari
